author: Brian Schrader
content: I've been chugging along with Microblogger the last couple of days, and progress has been good. Seeing as it's December 30th though, I doubt I'll make my end of the year deadline. Today, I added quite a bit of documentation and even a wiki to the project! I've also clarified the issues quite a bit, so if you're interested in helping out with the project, but aren't sure what you can help with, or if you want to read about how the project works go check it out!
title: Microblogger Wiki and Issues are Live!
